name: Having Fun With English Game
description:
A game from student. Support us to win Sáng Tạo Thanh Thiếu Niên Nhi Đồng award.

A game made on Scratch 3.0

This game has 3 levels:

Level 1 Clicking game: In this game,  we have a monkey holding animal pictures, help the monkey to choose the right name of the animals

Level 2 Balloon shot: In this level, you have to choose the correct balloon which have the right picture of fruits, shoot them and complete levels

Level 3 Fast typing: you have to use the keyboard to type the right word on the board, type as fast as you can to complete levels.

I hope you enjoy the game and don't forget to donate us a coffee cup, your donate will help our team a lot to produce even more interesting games

*The game made by student from Tan Thach Secondary School, Vietnam

A very special thank to;

STTTNNĐ Team and our IT teacher. 

The download of the game might be quite slow, please wait a few minutes
